card.title: Attendance at voting in the National Assembly through time

info.lead: MP's attendance at voting in the National Assembly through time.
info.text: Every month we count all ballots casted by the MP and divide them by the number of all voting instances for that month where the MP should have been voting. In cases where the MP did not have a mandate in the selected month we show the percentage of voting where they did not have the right to vote.
